description: Episode of Series "World in action". Reports on the explosion of a chemical factory in Seveso, Italy and the effects of the extremely toxic dust, dioxin, that was released into the atmosphere. The substance dioxin is contained in commercial weedkillers freely available in the United Kingdom.
